name: Comit the Astrodian
description: Platformer based on a 22 year old blueprint. Help Comit boost his was through several planets in an attempt to stop the evil space pirate Krater from taking over the Star System.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.27 Ghz Memory: 120 MB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 8 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
